quiz_intro.title: p1
quiz_intro.content: üéì The rules and regulations define your rights and obligations as a student. Everyone is responsible for acting in a way that keeps the community safe, fair, and conducive to learning. Violations of the rules and regulations may result in disciplinary action.

quiz_intro.title: p2
quiz_intro.content:
Responsible behavior includes 
üîç Following the rules and instructions of the educational institution and good practices for completing assignments 
üîç Behaving appropriately on campus and online 
üîç Not plagiarizing in assignments 
üîç Respecting the working environment and property of others

quiz_intro.title: p3
quiz_intro.content: üí° The rules are based on the Act on Universities of Applied Sciences (932/2014) and the Decree on Universities of Applied Sciences (1129/2014), which guarantee a safe and equal study community.

quiz_intro.title: p4
quiz_intro.content: üëâ Check out the rules and regulations! You can also find a link to the rules and regulations in the application directory.

quiz_intro.title: p5
quiz_intro.content: üß† Choose the right course of action. Answer the four questions. Only one answer option is correct for each question.

questions.title: Question 1
questions.content: Which of the following is responsible behavior on campus?

answers.title: a1
answers.content: Leaving your bag and coat in the middle of the classroom where others walk

answers.title: a2
answers.content: Using another student's login details because your own don't work

answers.title: a3
answers.content: Taking off your headphones and listening to the teacher during class

answers.title: a4
answers.content: Coming to class intoxicated so you won't be marked absent

questions.title: Question 2
questions.content: Which of the following is a responsible way to complete a learning assignment?

answers.title: a1
answers.content: Asking artificial intelligence to produce the entire assignment and submitting it as is

answers.title: a2
answers.content: Ask a friend for their answers and edit them to make them your own

answers.title: a3
answers.content: Do the assignment yourself and clearly cite your sources

answers.title: a4
answers.content: Using a model solution from a previous course without attribution

questions.title: Question 3
questions.content: What is acceptable behavior on campus according to the rules and regulations?

answers.title: a1
answers.content: Organizing a protest inside the campus

answers.title: a2
answers.content: Keeping the campus common areas clean and following the rules of conduct

answers.title: a3
answers.content: Bring a scooter to class

answers.title: a4
answers.content: Organizing a party in the classroom

questions.title: Question 4
questions.content: Which of the following is responsible digital behavior as a student?

answers.title: a1
answers.content: Share course materials prepared by the teacher openly on social media

answers.title: a2
answers.content: Log out of the computer and keep your user IDs secret

answers.title: a3
answers.content: Giving your username to a friend so they can read e-books through the library

answers.title: a4
answers.content: Using your school email address to log in to artificial intelligence services
